name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Cybersecurity Engineer with 13+ years of experience in compliance-driven development and risk management across diverse industries. Proficient in aligning solutions with key compliance frameworks and standards including **ISO 27001**, **ISO 42001**, **NIST**, **SOC 2**, **NIS2**, **IEC 62443**, and **CRA**. Demonstrated expertise in AI Governance and Cyber GRC, ensuring robust compliance architecture for high-performance applications.
Skilled in analytical thinking and relationship building, fostering collaboration and communication within fast-paced environments. Proven track record of goal-driven project delivery, leveraging technical skills in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and hands-on experience with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept at deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines, with a strong background in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
